Label.en: Two years went by, until an art dealer from Florence received a mysterious letter offering to sell the painting
Label.fr: Deux années passèrent, jusqu'à ce qu'un marchand d'art de Florence reçoive une mystérieuse lettre proposant de vendre le tableau
Label.es: Two years went by, until an art dealer from Florence received a mysterious letter offering to sell the painting

Label.en: The meeting was set up, and the seller turned out to be former museum worker, Vincenzo Peruggia!
Label.fr: La rencontre fut organisée, et le vendeur s'est avéré être l'ancien ouvrier du musée, Vincenzo Peruggia !
Label.es: The meeting was set up, and the seller turned out to be former museum worker, Vincenzo Peruggia!

Label.en: Unfortunately for Peruggia, it was a sting operation, and he was arrested!
Label.fr: Malheureusement pour Perugia, c'était une opération d'infiltration, et il fut arrêtée !
Label.es: Unfortunately for Peruggia, it was a sting operation, and he was arrested!
